titles.title: Prevent IRS Overreach Act of 2015

To prohibit the Internal Revenue Service from hiring new employees to enforce any provision of the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act or the Health Care and Education Reconciliation Act of 2010.
Prevent IRS Overreach Act of 2015

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary:
Prevent IRS Overreach Act of 2015
Prohibits the Internal Revenue Service from filling any position, by transfer or any other appointment taking effect on or after the enactment of this Act, if the duties and responsibilities of such position include the enforcement of any provision of, or amendment made by, the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act or the Health Care and Education Reconciliation Act of 2010.
